name: Surfacer+
description:
Surfacer+ is easy to pick up and has totally innovative gameplay, which will surprise you! Suitable for all gamers—casual or hardcore alike.

Fill the screen by producing white flowers with your stylus. Control the size of your flowers and use the bonuses at the right moment. Watch out for enemies who pounce from either side of the screen. Innovative and original, Surfacer+ calls on your skill, strategy and insight. Discover it on Nintendo DSiWare! How far will you go to cover the screen?
